title: Formula for Big Data success: Infographic
text: #Accenture Formula for Big Data success: Infographic Many businesses now have an understanding of what constitutes big data; making a success of big data is another matter. This infographic from Accenture reveals a four-step formula that spells big data success. It focuses on four Tâ€™s viz. types of data in an organization, latest technology and tools, techniques and talent. ETCIO | 23 September 2015, 8:05 AM IST
